EmailTemplate.name: Provider Community: Provider Welcome Email for Admin Assistants
EmailTemplate.subject: ACTION REQUESTED: Validate Providers Contact Information Through Sutter Provider Hub
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have been identified and approved as a delegate for [{!Contact.Tech_Admin_Associated_Providers__c}]. In this capacity you have been granted administrative access to make changes to their contact information on their behalf.
The accuracy and integrity of provider business information is a priority at Sutter Health. Accurate data ensures that patientsâ€™ protected health information (PHI), as well as other important business related documents, are delivered to a provider's preferred location. Sutter Health providers are asked to validate their contact information every 6 months.
If a patient of provider you represent may ever be seen at a Sutter Health affiliate for future care or outpatient services (e.g. radiology & lab tests), and/or Sutter patients may be referred to to this provider for follow-up care, it is important that you review--and if necessary update--the provider's contact information.
To validate the provider's contact information, visit the Sutter Provider Hub, a self-service application that allows you to easily and securely manage the provider's Sutter Health information. Clicking the link will take you to a page where you can set your password, then log in with the Username supplied below.
Username: {!Receiving_User.Username}
If the link above does not work, copy and paste www.sutterproviderhub.com into your web browser. If you need to reset your password, click on the Forgot Password link.
For technical support, please contact the IS Service Desk at 888-888-6044 or servicedesk@sutterhealth.org and reference the CRM-Salesforce Team. Additional details are available on the FAQ guide.
We appreciate your help with this important effort!
Thank you,
Arieh Rosenbaum, M.D.
c/o Sutter Provider Hub Team
To confirm the authenticity of this message, please feel free to contact the IS Service Desk by phone, or Arieh Rosenbaum, M.D. Chief Medical Information Officer, West Bay Region (Rosenba@Sutterhealth.org)
